Abyssal Blade.tags: STR Weapon, Two-Handed, Unwieldy, Rare, Essence 25
Abyssal Blade.content:
This steel greataxe has an oak handle capped in gold and it emits a faint glow. It has 1 charge, which it regains at midnight.


When you hit a creature, you may expend a charge. All protective spells affecting that target are immediately dispelled.
Abyssal Blade.description:
This steel greataxe has an oak handle capped in gold and it emits a faint
 glow. It has 1 charge, which it regains at midnight.

 When you hit a creature, you may expend a charge. All protective spells
 affecting that target are immediately dispelled.

Basilisk'S Fang.tags: DEX Weapon, One-Handed, Concealed, Light, Rare, Essence 30
Basilisk'S Fang.content: The curved silver blade of this bone-hilted dagger is printed with three monstrous eyelids. This weapon has 3 charges and regains one charge every 7 days. You can spend 1 charge and 3 AP to make a special attack. Make a DEX attack against a living target's WILL. On a hit, the target is Paralyzed. Creatures paralyzed by the Basilisk's Fang may make a DC 15 END check at the start of each of their turns for the next 10 minutes to end this condition. If they do not succeed during this time, the effects become permanent until they are restored via Greater Restoration or similar magic.
Basilisk'S Fang.description:
The curved silver blade of this bone-hilted dagger is printed with three
 monstrous eyelids. This weapon has 3 charges and regains one charge every 7
 days. You can spend 1 charge and 3 AP to make a special attack. Make a DEX
 attack against a living target's WILL. On a hit, the target is Paralyzed.
 Creatures paralyzed by the Basilisk's Fang may make a DC 15 END check at the
 start of each of their turns for the next 10 minutes to end this condition. If
 they do not succeed during this time, the effects become permanent until they
 are restored via Greater Restoration or similar magic.

Blade Of The Rodir.content: This folded steel katana has a hilt wrapped in red and blue dyed leather. You may spend 2 Reactive AP to make a DEX check when you are hit by a melee attack. If your roll is higher than the attack roll, that attack's damage is reduced to 0 (you still suffer any other effects). You may only use this feature once per turn.
Blade Of The Rodir.description:
This folded steel katana has a hilt wrapped in red and blue dyed leather. You
 may spend 2 Reactive AP to make a DEX check when you are hit by a melee
 attack. If your roll is higher than the attack roll, that attack's damage is
 reduced to 0 (you still suffer any other effects). You may only use this
 feature once per turn.

Bloody Blade.content: This ebony bladed katana has a hilt wrapped in blood-stained white cloth. When you hit with this weapon, regain HP equal to ½ the damage you dealt. However, while this weapon is equipped, you cannot regain hit points in any other manner. If you are Bloodied, you enter a bloody rage for your next 3 turns and must attack the closest creature to you. Attacks made while enraged in this way deal double damage.
Bloody Blade.description:
This ebony bladed katana has a hilt wrapped in blood-stained white cloth. When
 you hit with this weapon, regain HP equal to ½ the damage you dealt. However,
 while this weapon is equipped, you cannot regain hit points in any other
 manner. If you are Bloodied, you enter a bloody rage for your next 3 turns and
 must attack the closest creature to you. Attacks made while enraged in this
 way deal double damage.

Boom-Erang.tags: DEX Weapon, One-Handed, Light, Rare, Essence 20
Boom-Erang.content: This wooden boomerang is shaped like a bent lightning bolt. On a hit, the creature is Dazed and Deafened until the end of its next turn.
Boom-Erang.description:
This wooden boomerang is shaped like a bent lightning bolt. On a hit, the
 creature is Dazed and Deafened until the end of its next turn.

Bow Of Storms.tags: DEX Weapon, Two-Handed, Ammunition, Rare, Essence 20
Bow Of Storms.content: Faintly glowing blue runes cover this white ash longbow. The Bow of Storms has 3 charges and regains all charges at dawn. You may spend 1 charge to speak a command word and convert the next fired arrow into a lightning bolt. Make a DEX attack against the target's REF and the REF of each creature in a line between you and the target. Hit: 3d10 lightning damage. Miss: ½ damage.
Bow Of Storms.description:
Faintly glowing blue runes cover this white ash longbow. The Bow of Storms has
 3 charges and regains all charges at dawn. You may spend 1 charge to speak a
 command word and convert the next fired arrow into a lightning bolt. Make a
 DEX attack against the target's REF and the REF of each creature in a line
 between you and the target. Hit: 3d10 lightning damage. Miss: ½
 damage.

Bow Of Shooting Stars.tags: DEX Weapon, Two-Handed, Ammunition, Rare, Essence 15
Bow Of Shooting Stars.content: This longbow appears to be made from purple crystal. This bow has 3 charges and regains 1 charge at midnight. You may spend 1 charge when you hit to deal +1d6 radiant damage, and the target is Blinded until the end of their next turn.
Bow Of Shooting Stars.description:
This longbow appears to be made from purple crystal. This bow has 3 charges
 and regains 1 charge at midnight. You may spend 1 charge when you hit to deal
 +1d6 radiant damage, and the target is Blinded until the end of their next
 turn.

Cestus Of Knocking.tags: STR Weapon, One-Handed, Light, Uncommon, Essence 15
Cestus Of Knocking.content:
This brass cestus has a large door knocker mounted over the knuckles.


You may spend 5 AP to strike the surface of a wall or floor. If the surface is made of wood or stone, the attack creates a hole 3 ft wide, 4 ft tall, and 1 ft deep. (1/Rest)
Cestus Of Knocking.description:
This brass cestus has a large door knocker mounted over the knuckles.

 You may spend 5 AP to strike the surface of a wall or floor. If the surface is
 made of wood or stone, the attack creates a hole 3 ft wide, 4 ft tall, and 1
 ft deep. (1/Rest)

Colossus Greatslab.tags: STR Weapon, Two-Handed, Unwieldy, Uncommon, Essence 25
Colossus Greatslab.content: The iron blade of this greatsword is 3 ft wide and crudely made. You may spend 2 AP to plant the tip of the Colossus Greatslab into the ground. While planted, other creatures may only remove the Colossus Greatslab if they succeed on a DC 30 STR check, and the space the Colossus Greatslab occupies functions as a tower shield. While planted, this weapon cannot be used for abilities or to make attacks. Spending 2 AP allows you to pull the Colossus Greatslab from the ground, ending this feature.
Colossus Greatslab.description:
The iron blade of this greatsword is 3 ft wide and crudely made. You may spend
 2 AP to plant the tip of the Colossus Greatslab into the ground. While
 planted, other creatures may only remove the Colossus Greatslab if they
 succeed on a DC 30 STR check, and the space the Colossus Greatslab occupies
 functions as a tower shield. While planted, this weapon cannot be used for
 abilities or to make attacks. Spending 2 AP allows you to pull the Colossus
 Greatslab from the ground, ending this feature.

Commander'S Lance.content:
STR Weapon, Two-Handed (One-Handed if on a Mount), Unwieldy, Rare, Essence 25

This steel lance has engravings of knights on horseback all along its shaft.

If you attack a target after moving at least 10 ft in their direction, you may apply a +3 bonus to your attack roll, or +5 if you are on horseback. You may target their AR or their FORT, and if you hit, in addition to taking damage, the creature also falls Prone. (3/Recoup)
Commander'S Lance.description:
STR Weapon, Two-Handed (One-Handed if on a Mount), Unwieldy, Rare, Essence
 25

 This steel lance has engravings of knights on horseback all along its shaft.

 If you attack a target after moving at least 10 ft in their direction, you may
 apply a +3 bonus to your attack roll, or +5 if you are on horseback. You may
 target their AR or their FORT, and if you hit, in addition to taking damage,
 the creature also falls Prone. (3/Recoup)

Dancing Scimitar.content:
Tiny. Constructed



Hit Points 20 Armor Rating 15
Speed 0 ft, Hover 30 ft

Traits Immutable, Iron Will, Steel Mind
Dancing Scimitar.description:
Tiny. Constructed

 Hit Points 20 Armor Rating 15
Speed 0 ft, Hover 30
 ft

Traits Immutable, Iron Will, Steel Mind

Duelist'S Delight.tags: DEX Weapon, One-Handed, Ammunition, Light, Uncommon, Essence 15
Duelist'S Delight.content: This weapon appears to be a nondescript elm hand crossbow. This weapon has 2 charges and regains both charges at dawn each day. You may activate Duelist's Delight by spending 1 charge when you roll Initiative. Doing so adds +5 to your Initiative and causes your first successful attack with the Duelist's Delight within 1 minute of rolling Initiative to count as a crit.
Duelist'S Delight.description:
This weapon appears to be a nondescript elm hand crossbow. This weapon has 2
 charges and regains both charges at dawn each day. You may activate Duelist's
 Delight by spending 1 charge when you roll Initiative. Doing so adds +5 to
 your Initiative and causes your first successful attack with the Duelist's
 Delight within 1 minute of rolling Initiative to count as a crit.

Earthshaker.tags: STR Weapon, Hand-and-a-Half (1d12), Unwieldy, Rare, Essence 25
Earthshaker.content:
This dwarven warhammer appears to have a head made of solid ebony.


By spending 3 AP, you may strike the ground at your feet and make a special attack: +STR vs the FORT of all creatures within a 10 ft radius. If successful, those creatures fall Prone. (2/Recoup)
Earthshaker.description:
This dwarven warhammer appears to have a head made of solid ebony.

 By spending 3 AP, you may strike the ground at your feet and make a special
 attack: +STR vs the FORT of all creatures within a 10 ft radius. If
 successful, those creatures fall Prone. (2/Recoup)

Fate Cutter.content: The blade of this silver-hilted longsword is translucent like glass and emits a faint blue glow. You gain +4 to hit with this weapon. Attacks with this weapon ignore armor and magical bonuses to armor and your crit range increases by +1 with this weapon. If you crit a creature that is Bloodied, it immediately dies unless it has the Mythic trait. If it has the Mythic trait, it is instead Stunned until the start of your next turn.
Fate Cutter.description:
The blade of this silver-hilted longsword is translucent like glass and emits
 a faint blue glow. You gain +4 to hit with this weapon. Attacks with this
 weapon ignore armor and magical bonuses to armor and your crit range increases
 by +1 with this weapon. If you crit a creature that is Bloodied, it
 immediately dies unless it has the Mythic trait. If it has the Mythic trait,
 it is instead Stunned until the start of your next turn.

Flail Of The Elements.content: This long ash-hafted flail has three metal heads made from gold, silver, and iron. Gain +1 to attack rolls made with this weapon.
Flail Of The Elements.description:
This long ash-hafted flail has three metal heads made from gold, silver, and
 iron. Gain +1 to attack rolls made with this weapon.

Flametouched Longsword.content: This elegant longsword has a silver guard shaped like tongues of fire. You can speak a command word and ignite the blade in roaring flames that give off heat equivalent to a small bonfire but that do not burn you. While ignited, the longsword produces 20 ft of bright light and 20 ft of dim light.
Flametouched Longsword.description:
This elegant longsword has a silver guard shaped like tongues of fire. You can
 speak a command word and ignite the blade in roaring flames that give off heat
 equivalent to a small bonfire but that do not burn you. While ignited, the
 longsword produces 20 ft of bright light and 20 ft of dim light.

Fleshripper.tags: DEX Weapon, One-Handed, Concealed, Light, Uncommon, Essence 15
Fleshripper.content: The serrated steel blade of this dagger never dulls. On a hit, the target gains Bleeding (1).
Fleshripper.description:
The serrated steel blade of this dagger never dulls. On a hit, the target
 gains Bleeding (1).

Frostrime Battleaxe.content: This sinister battleaxe has a jagged steel head always rimmed with ice. You gain Resist Cold 2 and you are Immune to the effects of extreme cold.
Frostrime Battleaxe.description:
This sinister battleaxe has a jagged steel head always rimmed with ice. You
 gain Resist Cold 2 and you are Immune to the effects of extreme cold.

Glaive Of The Tomb Guardian.content:
The long iron blade of this black-hafted glaive protrudes from the mouth of a leering skull. It has 1 charge and regains its charge at midnight each night.


When used to attack creatures with the undead tag, this weapon gains +2 to attack and damage rolls.


You may spend 4 AP and 1 charge to summon 1d4 Skeletons to an unoccupied space within 15 ft of you. These skeletons obey your verbal commands, take their Initiative immediately after you, and last for one hour or until reduced to 0 HP.
Glaive Of The Tomb Guardian.description:
The long iron blade of this black-hafted glaive protrudes from the mouth of a
 leering skull. It has 1 charge and regains its charge at midnight each night.

 When used to attack creatures with the undead tag, this weapon gains +2 to
 attack and damage rolls.

 You may spend 4 AP and 1 charge to summon 1d4 Skeletons to an
 unoccupied space within 15 ft of you. These skeletons obey your verbal
 commands, take their Initiative immediately after you, and last for one hour
 or until reduced to 0 HP.

Hatchet Of Returning.content: The steel handle of this hatchet is slightly curved and perfectly balanced for throwing. You may spend 3 AP during your turn to call the weapon straight back to your hand so long as the weapon is visible and within 30 ft of you. Doing so allows you to make a special attack. Make a STR attack against the DEX of all creatures within the line between you and the Hatchet of Returning. On a hit, deal 1d4+1+STR sharp damage.
Hatchet Of Returning.description:
The steel handle of this hatchet is slightly curved and perfectly balanced for
 throwing. You may spend 3 AP during your turn to call the weapon straight back
 to your hand so long as the weapon is visible and within 30 ft of you. Doing
 so allows you to make a special attack. Make a STR attack against the DEX of
 all creatures within the line between you and the Hatchet of Returning. On a
 hit, deal 1d4+1+STR sharp damage.

Hero'S Standard.content: This wooden haft is capped in a silver spike and may be affixed with a flag or standard. While bearing a flag or standard, you may spend 6 AP to immediately end all Demoralized, Frightened, and Shaken conditions affecting yourself and allies within 100 ft of you.
Hero'S Standard.description:
This wooden haft is capped in a silver spike and may be affixed with a flag or
 standard. While bearing a flag or standard, you may spend 6 AP to immediately
 end all Demoralized, Frightened, and Shaken conditions affecting yourself and
 allies within 100 ft of you.

Hunter'S Bow.tags: DEX Weapon, Two-Handed, Ammunition, Uncommon, Essence 15
Hunter'S Bow.content: This cherry wood shortbow has a handle wrapped in speckled rabbit fur. When you hit with this bow, you may also mark the target for one hour. Attacks against marked targets gain +1 TA. While a creature is marked, you can always discern the marked target's location so long as they are on the same plane of existence. Only one creature may be marked by this feature at a time.
Hunter'S Bow.description:
This cherry wood shortbow has a handle wrapped in speckled rabbit fur. When
 you hit with this bow, you may also mark the target for one hour. Attacks
 against marked targets gain +1 TA. While a creature is marked, you can always
 discern the marked target's location so long as they are on the same plane of
 existence. Only one creature may be marked by this feature at a time.

Jailer'S Branding Iron.content: This long iron poker has a flat brand at its tip depicting a hangman's noose. This weapon has 4 charges and regains 1d4 charges at dawn each day. You may activate the Jailer's Branding Iron by spending 1 charge, which causes the brand to glow a molten orange. The next time you hit, deal +1d6 fire damage and the target is branded. As long as the brand persists, you know the approximate location of the target while they are on the same plane of existence as you. The brand may only be removed by Lesser Restoration or similar magic. You may have a number of branded creatures equal to your CHA x2.
Jailer'S Branding Iron.description:
This long iron poker has a flat brand at its tip depicting a hangman's noose.
 This weapon has 4 charges and regains 1d4 charges at dawn each day. You may
 activate the Jailer's Branding Iron by spending 1 charge, which causes the
 brand to glow a molten orange. The next time you hit, deal +1d6 fire damage
 and the target is branded. As long as the brand persists, you know the
 approximate location of the target while they are on the same plane of
 existence as you. The brand may only be removed by Lesser Restoration or
 similar magic. You may have a number of branded creatures equal to your CHA
 x2.

Kraken'S Woe.tags: STR Weapon, One-Handed, Light, Rare, Essence 30
Kraken'S Woe.content:
The barbed head of this black trident is carved from one piece of large bone with a 60 ft rope fastened to an iron ring at the base of its haft. So long as you have secured this rope on your person, you may spend 1 AP to pull the Kraken's Woe back into your hand. If you do this immediately after a successful ranged attack with Kraken's Woe, make a STR check against the target's FORT. If successful, the target gains Bleeding (1d6).


Additionally, deal +1d6 sharp damage when attacking creatures two Sizes or more larger than you.
Kraken'S Woe.description:
The barbed head of this black trident is carved from one piece of large bone
 with a 60 ft rope fastened to an iron ring at the base of its haft. So long as
 you have secured this rope on your person, you may spend 1 AP to pull the
 Kraken's Woe back into your hand. If you do this immediately after a
 successful ranged attack with Kraken's Woe, make a STR check against the
 target's FORT. If successful, the target gains Bleeding (1d6).

 Additionally, deal +1d6 sharp damage when attacking creatures two Sizes or
 more larger than you.

Lightning Bolt Spear.tags: STR or DEX Weapon, Hand-and-a-Half (APC 2), Rare, Essence 20
Lightning Bolt Spear.content: The oaken haft of this unadorned spear crackles with electricity. After being thrown, this weapon magically returns to your hand at the start of your next turn.
Lightning Bolt Spear.description:
The oaken haft of this unadorned spear crackles with electricity. After being
 thrown, this weapon magically returns to your hand at the start of your next
 turn.

Lightning Lasher.tags: DEX Weapon, One-Handed, Light, Rare, Essence 25
Lightning Lasher.content:
This leather whip has a large feather attached to the handle and emits a faint static charge to the touch. When you make an attack with this weapon, you can spend 2 AP to make a secondary DEX attack against the target's REF. On a hit, the target becomes Grappled (escape DC 15) if it is Medium or smaller.


While a target is Grappled, Lightning Lash may not be used to make melee attacks, but you may spend 1 AP to deal 1d6+2 lightning damage to the Grappled target. (1/Turn)
Lightning Lasher.description:
This leather whip has a large feather attached to the handle and emits a faint
 static charge to the touch. When you make an attack with this weapon, you can
 spend 2 AP to make a secondary DEX attack against the target's REF. On a hit,
 the target becomes Grappled (escape DC 15) if it is Medium or smaller.

 While a target is Grappled, Lightning Lash may not be used to make melee
 attacks, but you may spend 1 AP to deal 1d6+2 lightning damage to the Grappled
 target. (1/Turn)

Lute Of Lost Tones.content: This bronze-edged lute is made of solid oak and produces deep, full tones when played. Successful melee attacks with the Lute of Lost Tones give the target the Deafened condition until the end of their next turn. Additionally, you gain +4 to CHA/Instrument checks using this item.
Lute Of Lost Tones.description:
This bronze-edged lute is made of solid oak and produces deep, full tones when
 played. Successful melee attacks with the Lute of Lost Tones give the target
 the Deafened condition until the end of their next turn. Additionally, you
 gain +4 to CHA/Instrument checks using this item.

Mariner'S Friend.tags: DEX Weapon, One-Handed, Light, Common, Essence 10
Mariner'S Friend.content: This plain cutlass has a compass fixed into the hilt. You gain +4 to Navigating* checks and can always find true north. You cannot be unwillingly disarmed of this weapon.
Mariner'S Friend.description:
This plain cutlass has a compass fixed into the hilt. You gain +4 to
 Navigating* checks and can always find true north. You cannot be unwillingly
 disarmed of this weapon.

Mul'Ator Blade.tags: DEX Weapon, One-Handed, Concealed, Light, Rare, Essence 20
Mul'Ator Blade.content: These curved blades are specially forged for the Mul'Ator assassins, who pride themselves on a single killing strike. Attacks with this weapon gain +1 to their crit range, and when you crit, after you calculate your damage, double it.
Mul'Ator Blade.description:
These curved blades are specially forged for the Mul'Ator assassins, who pride
 themselves on a single killing strike. Attacks with this weapon gain +1 to
 their crit range, and when you crit, after you calculate your damage, double
 it.

Realmstalker.tags: DEX Weapon, Two-Handed, Unwieldy, Rare, Essence 35
Realmstalker.content: This black-handled scythe has a thin blade made of light blue crystal. This weapon has 2 charges and regains 1 charge at dusk each night. You may spend 1 charge and 6 AP to open a portal in the air. This portal may go to any location you have visited before so long as that location is on the same plane of existence. Any creature that steps through the portal as part of a movement action is instantly transported to the chosen location. After one minute, the portal closes.
Realmstalker.description:
This black-handled scythe has a thin blade made of light blue crystal. This
 weapon has 2 charges and regains 1 charge at dusk each night. You may spend 1
 charge and 6 AP to open a portal in the air. This portal may go to any
 location you have visited before so long as that location is on the same plane
 of existence. Any creature that steps through the portal as part of a movement
 action is instantly transported to the chosen location. After one minute, the
 portal closes.

Scorpion'S Sting.tags: DEX Weapon, One-Handed, Concealed, Light, Uncommon, Essence 15
Scorpion'S Sting.content: This dagger appears to be the curved stinger of a giant scorpion with a crude, leather-wrapped hilt. When you hit, make a secondary attack with an additional +2 bonus against the target's FORT. On a hit, 1d6 toxic damage.
Scorpion'S Sting.description:
This dagger appears to be the curved stinger of a giant scorpion with a crude,
 leather-wrapped hilt. When you hit, make a secondary attack with an additional
 +2 bonus against the target's FORT. On a hit, 1d6 toxic damage.

Sickle Of Culling.tags: DEX Weapon, One-Handed, Light, Uncommon, Essence 10
Sickle Of Culling.content: The handle of this sickle appears to be made of tightly twisted vines. Attacks made with this weapon against creatures with the plant tag gain +2 TA on their attack rolls and +2 on their damage rolls.
Sickle Of Culling.description:
The handle of this sickle appears to be made of tightly twisted vines. Attacks
 made with this weapon against creatures with the plant tag gain +2 TA on their
 attack rolls and +2 on their damage rolls.

Soulbound Dagger.tags: DEX Weapon, One-Handed, Concealed, Light, Common, Essence 10
Soulbound Dagger.content: This unassuming iron dagger is well balanced for throwing. Immediately after using this dagger to make a ranged attack, it magically returns to your hand. You cannot be forcibly disarmed of this dagger.
Soulbound Dagger.description:
This unassuming iron dagger is well balanced for throwing. Immediately after
 using this dagger to make a ranged attack, it magically returns to your hand.
 You cannot be forcibly disarmed of this dagger.

Spirit Bow.content: This weapon appears to be a plain black-leather arm guard commonly worn by archers. While worn, if both hands are free, you may make a ranged attack as if you were wielding a longbow. A translucent, ghostly image of this longbow appears in your hands along with an arrow to be used as ammunition. After the attack action is complete, both the weapon and the arrow immediately vanish.
Spirit Bow.description:
This weapon appears to be a plain black-leather arm guard commonly worn by
 archers. While worn, if both hands are free, you may make a ranged attack as
 if you were wielding a longbow. A translucent, ghostly image of this longbow
 appears in your hands along with an arrow to be used as ammunition. After the
 attack action is complete, both the weapon and the arrow immediately vanish.

Staff Of Vipers.content:
This wooden quarterstaff appears to be completely wrapped in snake skin.


You may spend 4 AP to throw the staff onto the ground and summon a Constrictor Snake to an unoccupied space within 5 ft of you. This constrictor snake remains for 10 minutes, or until defeated, obeys your mental commands, and takes its turn immediately after you. (1/Rest)
Staff Of Vipers.description:
This wooden quarterstaff appears to be completely wrapped in snake skin.

 You may spend 4 AP to throw the staff onto the ground and summon a
 Constrictor Snake to an unoccupied space within 5 ft of you. This
 constrictor snake remains for 10 minutes, or until defeated, obeys your mental
 commands, and takes its turn immediately after you. (1/Rest)

Staff Of Whirlwinds.content: This white ash quarterstaff is wrapped in dark blue leather and capped in silver. The staff has 3 charges, and regains 1d3 charges daily at dawn. When you make a successful melee attack against a target that is Medium or smaller, that target is pushed back 5 ft away from you. Additionally, you may spend 4 AP and 1 charge to create a 20 ft cone of wind and make a special attack. Make an END attack against the FORT of all creatures in the cone. On a hit, deal 1d8+2 blunt damage and targets are pushed back 20 ft. On a miss, deal ½ damage and targets are not pushed away.
Staff Of Whirlwinds.description:
This white ash quarterstaff is wrapped in dark blue leather and capped in
 silver. The staff has 3 charges, and regains 1d3 charges daily at dawn. When
 you make a successful melee attack against a target that is Medium or smaller,
 that target is pushed back 5 ft away from you. Additionally, you may spend 4
 AP and 1 charge to create a 20 ft cone of wind and make a special attack. Make
 an END attack against the FORT of all creatures in the cone. On a hit, deal
 1d8+2 blunt damage and targets are pushed back 20 ft. On a miss, deal ½ damage
 and targets are not pushed away.

Taste Of Nobility.content: This golden-hilted rapier has a guard shaped like a blooming rose. You gain +2 WILL, and when you crit with this weapon, you regain 1d10 HP.
Taste Of Nobility.description:
This golden-hilted rapier has a guard shaped like a blooming rose. You gain +2
 WILL, and when you crit with this weapon, you regain 1d10 HP.

Ursine Mace.content: The bronze head of this mace is shaped like a roaring bear. You gain +2 STR (which can exceed your Attribute Cap) and -1 DEX.
Ursine Mace.description:
The bronze head of this mace is shaped like a roaring bear. You gain +2 STR
 (which can exceed your Attribute Cap) and -1 DEX.

Vampire'S Bane.content: This sharpened white oak spear is wrapped in dark red leather. You gain Resist Charmed 5. When used to attack creatures with the undead tag, this weapon gains +2 to hit and deals +1d8 radiant damage. On a crit against undead, after calculating the critical damage, double it.
Vampire'S Bane.description:
This sharpened white oak spear is wrapped in dark red leather. You gain Resist
 Charmed 5. When used to attack creatures with the undead tag, this weapon
 gains +2 to hit and deals +1d8 radiant damage. On a crit against undead, after
 calculating the critical damage, double it.

War Wizard'S Wand.content: This white ash wand is affixed with a 4-sided tumbler in the hilt. Each side has a single symbol: a flame (fire), a lightning bolt (lightning), a snowflake (cold), and a skull (corrosive). You may spend 1 AP to shift the tumbler to a specific symbol. Doing so changes the elemental damage type of all attacks made with the War Wizard's Wand until changed again.
War Wizard'S Wand.description:
This white ash wand is affixed with a 4-sided tumbler in the hilt. Each side
 has a single symbol: a flame (fire), a lightning bolt (lightning), a snowflake
 (cold), and a skull (corrosive). You may spend 1 AP to shift the tumbler to a
 specific symbol. Doing so changes the elemental damage type of all attacks
 made with the War Wizard's Wand until changed again.

Wasp.content: The hilt of this iron rapier is wrapped in alternating yellow and black dyed leather. Each subsequent successful attack made with this weapon against the same target deals +1 sharp damage. This bonus resets at the start of each of your turns.
Wasp.description:
The hilt of this iron rapier is wrapped in alternating yellow and black dyed
 leather. Each subsequent successful attack made with this weapon against the
 same target deals +1 sharp damage. This bonus resets at the start of each of
 your turns.

Woodcutter'S Axe.content: This battleaxe has gnarled roots grown around its handle that weave up around the head of the axe. This weapon has 1 charge, which it regains daily at dawn. You can listen closely and hear soft whispers coming from the roots. You cannot be disarmed of this weapon. You may expend the weapon's charge to discern the axe's whispers: You find the location of nearby fresh water and enough food for 2d4 individuals, provided that water and food can be found within 1 mile.
Woodcutter'S Axe.description:
This battleaxe has gnarled roots grown around its handle that weave up around
 the head of the axe. This weapon has 1 charge, which it regains daily at dawn.
 You can listen closely and hear soft whispers coming from the roots. You
 cannot be disarmed of this weapon. You may expend the weapon's charge to
 discern the axe's whispers: You find the location of nearby fresh water and
 enough food for 2d4 individuals, provided that water and food can be found
 within 1 mile.
